headline: Ask HN: Why aren't we see many video hosting companies adopt peertube or P2P?
description:
I recently found the peertube and its technology is very nice. You could deliver video using p2p torrent like streaming if there are more than 1 user watching it. For me it looks like the hosting provider gets a huge savings in terms of bandwidth. But I don't see many companies making use of this technology.

I think Bitchute is using p2p to deliver videos, or is it, really?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 为什么我们没有看到许多视频托管公司采用peertube或P2P？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 為什麼我們沒有看到許多視頻託管公司採用peertube或P2P？
description_zh-Hans:
我最近发现peertube，它的技术非常好。如果有1个以上的用户在看视频，你可以用p2p torrent的方式来传送视频。对我来说，看起来托管商在带宽方面得到了巨大的节省。但我没有看到很多公司利用这项技术。

我认为Bitchute是用p2p来传送视频，或者是，真的吗？
description_zh-Hant:

我認為Bitchute是用p2p來傳送視頻，或者是，真的嗎？
